objectDesc.p: Stone, ?x?, 1 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 8 (9) line(s) per column, 6-7 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Discovered 1858 by Tassos D. Neroutsos at Karmūs, Miṣr in situ on a column in the vestibule of a funerary chapel.

sourceDesc.bibl: Lefebvre, Gustave, Recueil des inscriptions grecques-chrétiennes d'Égypte, no. 33, p. 8, Institut Francais d'Archeologie Orientale du Caire: Le Caire, Égypte, 1907. OCLC 7065867.
